* 
 * Backend endpoints:
 * - GET /api/v1/tenants/metrics - Tenant performance metrics
 * - GET /api/v1/stats/eps - Events per second statistics
 * - GET /api/v1/tenants/{id}/parsing-errors - Parsing error details
